data.title: SCARFACE The World is Yours (PS2) *STEEL COLLECTOR'S EDITION*
data.meta_description: Excellent Condition & complete with all inner contents: SCARFACE THE WORLD IS YOURS COLLECTOR'S LIMITED EDITION for SONY PlayStation 2 / PS2. This
data.text:
Description

Excellent Condition & complete with all inner contents: SCARFACE THE WORLD IS YOURS COLLECTOR’S LIMITED EDITION for SONY PlayStation 2 / PS2. This preowned authentic Limited Collector’s Steelbook Edition comes complete with all inner contents in Pristine Condition: Game Manual / Booklet + Poster / Map + Game Disc + Bonus DVD Disc. The steelbook is also structurally excellent, with some mild cosmetic aging spots pictured which are consistent with the natural aging of these limited steel cases. Refer images. A tidy and complete collector’s item. Included:

LIMITED STEEL COLLECTOR’S CASE

Game Manual

Game Disc

Printed World Map

DVD with the following content:

Making Of

Cast Videos and Interviews

Game Walk-through with Producer Commentary

Hints and tips video

Concept Art

Plus other misc. video materials

Description

They though you were dead, but Tony Montana don’t die so easy. Sosa took everything you had. Now you’ve got nothing, but that never stopped you before. You’re back with a vengeance, ready to relcaim your turf and rebuild your empire.

Live the turbulent life of the infamous Cuban drug lord who redefined the American Dream, in an original, explosive script by famed screenwriter David McKenna (Blow, American History X). Climb your way back to the top through saavy deals and brutal intimidation. First you get the money, then you get the power, then you get revenge.

Features:

Beat down, blow away, or run over your enemies with Tony’s signature style and flair

Bury those cock-a-roaches in Blind Rage Mode.

Insult, intimidate and impress the way only Tony can.

Become the kingpin of a thriving underworld economy.

Experience the lavish lifestyle of a crime boss

Hire henchmen to do your dirty work

The open world of Miami and the Islands is yours – no loade time, no limits
